db:abstract.db:para: QML frontend for the Qt3DInput::QInputSequence C++ class.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.7.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Represents a set of QAbstractActionInput's that must be triggerd one after the other.
The following example shows a chord that will be triggered by pressing the A and S keys together with a tolerence of 10 miliseconds between presses.

db:section.db:title: buttonInterval : int
db:section.db:para: The maximum time in milliseconds in between consecutive QAbstractActionInput's in the input sequence.

db:section.db:title: timeout : int
db:section.db:para: The time in milliseconds in which all QAbstractActionInput's in the input sequence must triggered within.

db:section.db:title: buttonIntervalChanged()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the buttonInterval of the input sequence is changed.

db:section.db:title: timeoutChanged()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the timeout of the input sequence is changed.
